alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 12:59PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wasatch...southwestern Duchesne and southeastern Utah Counties through 145 PM MDT... At 1259 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northeast of Scofield, or 23 miles northwest of Price, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Colton and Soldier Summit. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 208 and 219. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Basin
